description: A script acting as a development environment shim for Create React App (CRA) projects. It maps CLI flags (--port, --host) to environment variables expected by react-scripts start, ensuring cross-platform compatibility. It then spawns the React development server with the configured environment.

methods.name: parseArgs(argv)
methods.description: Parses command-line arguments to extract port, host, and passthrough arguments for the React dev server.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main function that sets environment variables based on parsed args and spawns the React dev server process.

ctags.name: host
ctags.pattern: /^  const result = { port: undefined, host: undefined, passthrough: [] };$/

ctags.name: passthrough
ctags.pattern: /^  const result = { port: undefined, host: undefined, passthrough: [] };$/

ctags.name: port
ctags.pattern: /^  const result = { port: undefined, host: undefined, passthrough: [] };$/

ctags.name: result
ctags.pattern: /^  const result = { port: undefined, host: undefined, passthrough: [] };$/

fields.name: const result = { port: undefined, host: undefined, passthrough: [] };
